name: Office Worker Revenge 3D
description:
Workers is a big counter-attack stimulus vent 3D action game,
Work pressure big? Being bullied in charge my colleagues?
"Tit for tat, double your money back," the time has come to take revenge protagonist along with it!
Enjoy smashed office, playing violent hateful boss in charge
Give vent to your stress now!

Gameplay

The game is very simple operation,
In the weapons shop to buy all kinds of weapons,
Against your enemies,
Smashed office supplies will fall syrup
Down with colleagues will drop money
